name: Applied Resources Corporation, Appellant, v. Leon Clemmer and Associates; Leon Clemmer and Associates v. Applied Resources Corporation, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
parties: Applied Resources Corporation, Appellant, v. Leon Clemmer and Associates. Leon Clemmer and Associates v. Applied Resources Corporation, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Chmles B. Burr, II, with him Obermayer, liebmann, Masowell & Hippel, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Applied Resources Corporation, Appellant, v. Leon Clemmer and Associates. Leon Clemmer and Associates v. Applied Resources Corporation, Appellant.
Argued November 14, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
Francis L. Davey, for appellant.
Chmles B. Burr, II, with him Obermayer, liebmann, Masowell & Hippel, for appellee.
January 24, 1974:
